title: Constructivist-Based Language Project Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational language knowledge (intermediate+ grammar/vocabulary)
context.additional_context: Team-based collaborative project implementation in digital device-enabled environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply constructivist learning strategies in theme-based language projects with over 80% applicability.
Participating students complete at least three cycles of feedback using collaboration tools.
Trainees analyze TPT template modification cases and propose application plans for two or more subject areas
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
